nodes.text: Beth Revis is a novelist who wrote the 2017 novel Rebel Rising, the comic miniseries Star Wars: Forces of Destiny—Ahsoka & Padmé, and the short story "Fully Operational," which was published as part of the anthology From a Certain Point of View.

She is the author of the Across the Universe science fiction series, the companion novel The Body Electric, and A World Without You. Revis lives in rural North Carolina with her husband, son, and two dogs.
